txt.en:
'Good work, so far. Get your hands back to work and refine that <rgb=#FF00FF00>copper ingot</rgb>.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>To open your crafting panel, you can use the 'T' key or click on the crafting button (it looks like a hammer and anvil) in the lower left part of your UI.

Select the Prospecting tab in the craft UI and find the proper recipe.

Remember: in order to execute a recipe you must be near the proper facility. Prospecting requires a forge.</rgb>
Bring the <rgb=#FF00FF00>copper ingot</rgb> to the supplier

'So you'd like to learn about prospecting? It can be a lucrative profession if you're willing to put in the effort.

'I'll walk you through the basics. If at any point you get confused, speak to me and I'll explain things again.

'I almost forgot the most important thing for every new prospector -- ingredients. Everything you need is inside this <rgb=#FF00FF00>crate</rgb>.

'Open it up, ensure your <rgb=#FF00FF00>prospector's pickaxe</rgb> is equipped, then make your way to the <rgb=#FF00FF00>forge</rgb>.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>Suppliers provide the secondary ingredients necessary for Prospectors to refine the materials that they collect. As this is a ï¿½
